text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 29 and 31 July 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Rui Silva ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Gert-Jan Liefers ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Mehdi Baala ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 31 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
